alert.note: Alert for Boone; Hendricks; Montgomery; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:28PM EDT until July 17 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hendricks County in central Indiana... Southwestern Boone County in central Indiana... Southeastern Montgomery County in west central Indiana... Northeastern Putnam County in west central Indiana... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crawfordsville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ladoga around 540 PM EDT. Roachdale and New Ross around 545 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Jamestown, North Salem and Lizton. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 50 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
